string-array.name: factory_test
string-array.item:
but I always say,
one's company,
two's a crowd,
and three's a party.
the idea of waiting for\nsomething makes it\nmore exciting.
i wonder if it\'s possible\nto have a love affair\nthat lasts forever.
art is what you can\nget away with.

in the future
everybody will
be world famous
for fifteen minutes.
